28#include <sys/cdefs.h>
29__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_dispnv04_overlay.c,v 1.3 2018/08/27 04:58:29 riastradh Exp $");
30
31#include <drm/drmP.h>
32#include <drm/drm_crtc.h>
33#include <drm/drm_fourcc.h>
34
35#include "nouveau_drm.h"
36
37#include "nouveau_bo.h"
38#include "nouveau_connector.h"
39#include "nouveau_display.h"
40#include "nvreg.h"

42#include "dispnv04/disp.h"
43
44struct nouveau_plane {
45 struct drm_plane base;
46 bool flip;
47 struct nouveau_bo *cur;
48
49 struct {
50 struct drm_property *colorkey;
51 struct drm_property *contrast;
52 struct drm_property *brightness;
53 struct drm_property *hue;
54 struct drm_property *saturation;
55 struct drm_property *iturbt_709;
56 } props;
57
58 int colorkey;
59 int contrast;
60 int brightness;
61 int hue;
62 int saturation;
63 int iturbt_709;
64
65 void (*set_params)(struct nouveau_plane *);
66};
67
68static const uint32_t formats[] = {
69 DRM_FORMAT_YUYV,
70 DRM_FORMAT_UYVY,
71 DRM_FORMAT_NV12,
72};
73
74/* Sine can be approximated with
75 * http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhaskara_I's_sine_approximation_formula
76 * sin(x degrees) ~= 4 x (180 - x) / (40500 - x (180 - x) )
77 * Note that this only works for the range [0, 180].
78 * Also note that sin(x) == -sin(x - 180)
79 */
80static inline int
81sin_mul(int degrees, int factor)
82{
83 if (degrees > 180) {
84 degrees -= 180;
85 factor *= -1;
86 }
87 return factor * 4 * degrees * (180 - degrees) /
88 (40500 - degrees * (180 - degrees));
89}
90
91/* cos(x) = sin(x + 90) */
92static inline int
93cos_mul(int degrees, int factor)
94{
95 return sin_mul((degrees + 90) % 360, factor);
96}
97
98static int
99nv10_update_plane(struct drm_plane *plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc,
100 struct drm_framebuffer *fb, int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
101 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
102 uint32_t src_x, uint32_t src_y,
103 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h)
104{
105 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(plane->dev);
106 struct nvif_object *dev = &drm->device.object;
107 struct nouveau_plane *nv_plane =
108 container_of(plane, struct nouveau_plane, base);
109 struct nouveau_framebuffer *nv_fb = nouveau_framebuffer(fb);
110 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
111 struct nouveau_bo *cur = nv_plane->cur;
112 bool flip = nv_plane->flip;
113 int soff = NV_PCRTC0_SIZE * nv_crtc->index;
114 int soff2 = NV_PCRTC0_SIZE * !nv_crtc->index;
115 int format, ret;
116
117 /* Source parameters given in 16.16 fixed point, ignore fractional. */
118 src_x >>= 16;
119 src_y >>= 16;
120 src_w >>= 16;
121 src_h >>= 16;
122
123#ifdef __NetBSD__ /* XXX ALIGN means something else. */
124 format = round_up(src_w * 4, 0x100);
125#else
126 format = ALIGN(src_w * 4, 0x100);
127#endif
128
129 if (format > 0xffff)
130 return -ERANGE;
131
132 if (drm->device.info.chipset >= 0x30) {
133 if (crtc_w < (src_w >> 1) || crtc_h < (src_h >> 1))
134 return -ERANGE;
135 } else {
136 if (crtc_w < (src_w >> 3) || crtc_h < (src_h >> 3))
137 return -ERANGE;
138 }
139
140 ret = nouveau_bo_pin(nv_fb->nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM, false);
141 if (ret)
142 return ret;
143
144 nv_plane->cur = nv_fb->nvbo;
145
146 nvif_mask(dev, NV_PCRTC_ENGINE_CTRL + soff, NV_CRTC_FSEL_OVERLAY, NV_CRTC_FSEL_OVERLAY);
147 nvif_mask(dev, NV_PCRTC_ENGINE_CTRL + soff2, NV_CRTC_FSEL_OVERLAY, 0);
148
149 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_BASE(flip), 0);
150 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_OFFSET_BUFF(flip), nv_fb->nvbo->bo.offset);
151 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_SIZE_IN(flip), src_h << 16 | src_w);
152 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_POINT_IN(flip), src_y << 16 | src_x);
153 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_DS_DX(flip), (src_w << 20) / crtc_w);
154 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_DT_DY(flip), (src_h << 20) / crtc_h);
155 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_POINT_OUT(flip), crtc_y << 16 | crtc_x);
156 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_SIZE_OUT(flip), crtc_h << 16 | crtc_w);
157
158 if (fb->pixel_format != DRM_FORMAT_UYVY)
159 format |= NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_COLOR_LE_CR8YB8CB8YA8;
160 if (fb->pixel_format == DRM_FORMAT_NV12)
161 format |= NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_PLANAR;
162 if (nv_plane->iturbt_709)
163 format |= NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_MATRIX_ITURBT709;
164 if (nv_plane->colorkey & (1 << 24))
165 format |= NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_DISPLAY_COLOR_KEY;
166
167 if (fb->pixel_format == DRM_FORMAT_NV12) {
168 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_UVPLANE_BASE(flip), 0);
169 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_UVPLANE_OFFSET_BUFF(flip),
170 nv_fb->nvbo->bo.offset + fb->offsets[1]);
171 }
172 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT(flip), format);
173 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_STOP, 0);
174 /* TODO: wait for vblank? */
175 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_BUFFER, flip ? 0x10 : 0x1);
176 nv_plane->flip = !flip;
177
178 if (cur)
179 nouveau_bo_unpin(cur);
180
181 return 0;
182}
183
184static int
185nv10_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *plane)
186{
187 struct nvif_object *dev = &nouveau_drm(plane->dev)->device.object;
188 struct nouveau_plane *nv_plane =
189 container_of(plane, struct nouveau_plane, base);
190
191 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_STOP, 1);
192 if (nv_plane->cur) {
193 nouveau_bo_unpin(nv_plane->cur);
194 nv_plane->cur = NULL;
195 }
196
197 return 0;
198}
199
200static void
201nv_destroy_plane(struct drm_plane *plane)
202{
203 plane->funcs->disable_plane(plane);
204 drm_plane_cleanup(plane);
205 kfree(plane);
206}
207
208static void
209nv10_set_params(struct nouveau_plane *plane)
210{
211 struct nvif_object *dev = &nouveau_drm(plane->base.dev)->device.object;
212 u32 luma = (plane->brightness - 512) << 16 | plane->contrast;
213 u32 chroma = ((sin_mul(plane->hue, plane->saturation) & 0xffff) << 16) |
214 (cos_mul(plane->hue, plane->saturation) & 0xffff);
215 u32 format = 0;
216
217 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_LUMINANCE(0), luma);
218 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_LUMINANCE(1), luma);
219 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_CHROMINANCE(0), chroma);
220 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_CHROMINANCE(1), chroma);
221 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_COLOR_KEY, plane->colorkey & 0xffffff);
222
223 if (plane->cur) {
224 if (plane->iturbt_709)
225 format |= NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_MATRIX_ITURBT709;
226 if (plane->colorkey & (1 << 24))
227 format |= NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_DISPLAY_COLOR_KEY;
228 nvif_mask(dev, NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT(plane->flip),
229 NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_MATRIX_ITURBT709 |
230 NV_PVIDEO_FORMAT_DISPLAY_COLOR_KEY,
231 format);
232 }
233}
234
235static int
236nv_set_property(struct drm_plane *plane,
237 struct drm_property *property,
238 uint64_t value)
239{
240 struct nouveau_plane *nv_plane =
241 container_of(plane, struct nouveau_plane, base);
242
243 if (property == nv_plane->props.colorkey)
244 nv_plane->colorkey = value;
245 else if (property == nv_plane->props.contrast)
246 nv_plane->contrast = value;
247 else if (property == nv_plane->props.brightness)
248 nv_plane->brightness = value;
249 else if (property == nv_plane->props.hue)
250 nv_plane->hue = value;
251 else if (property == nv_plane->props.saturation)
252 nv_plane->saturation = value;
253 else if (property == nv_plane->props.iturbt_709)
254 nv_plane->iturbt_709 = value;
255 else
256 return -EINVAL;
257
258 if (nv_plane->set_params)
259 nv_plane->set_params(nv_plane);
260 return 0;
261}
262
263static const struct drm_plane_funcs nv10_plane_funcs = {
264 .update_plane = nv10_update_plane,
265 .disable_plane = nv10_disable_plane,
266 .set_property = nv_set_property,
267 .destroy = nv_destroy_plane,
268};
269
270static void
271nv10_overlay_init(struct drm_device *device)
272{
273 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(device);
274 struct nouveau_plane *plane = kzalloc(sizeof(struct nouveau_plane), GFP_KERNEL);
275 unsigned int num_formats = ARRAY_SIZE(formats);
276 int ret;
277
278 if (!plane)
279 return;
280
281 switch (drm->device.info.chipset) {
282 case 0x10:
283 case 0x11:
284 case 0x15:
285 case 0x1a:
286 case 0x20:
287 num_formats = 2;
288 break;
289 }
290
291 ret = drm_plane_init(device, &plane->base, 3 /* both crtc's */,
292 &nv10_plane_funcs,
293 formats, num_formats, false);
294 if (ret)
295 goto err;
296
297 /* Set up the plane properties */
298 plane->props.colorkey = drm_property_create_range(
299 device, 0, "colorkey", 0, 0x01ffffff);
300 plane->props.contrast = drm_property_create_range(
301 device, 0, "contrast", 0, 8192 - 1);
302 plane->props.brightness = drm_property_create_range(
303 device, 0, "brightness", 0, 1024);
304 plane->props.hue = drm_property_create_range(
305 device, 0, "hue", 0, 359);
306 plane->props.saturation = drm_property_create_range(
307 device, 0, "saturation", 0, 8192 - 1);
308 plane->props.iturbt_709 = drm_property_create_range(
309 device, 0, "iturbt_709", 0, 1);
310 if (!plane->props.colorkey ||
311 !plane->props.contrast ||
312 !plane->props.brightness ||
313 !plane->props.hue ||
314 !plane->props.saturation ||
315 !plane->props.iturbt_709)
316 goto cleanup;
317
318 plane->colorkey = 0;
319 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
320 plane->props.colorkey, plane->colorkey);
321
322 plane->contrast = 0x1000;
323 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
324 plane->props.contrast, plane->contrast);
325
326 plane->brightness = 512;
327 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
328 plane->props.brightness, plane->brightness);
329
330 plane->hue = 0;
331 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
332 plane->props.hue, plane->hue);
333
334 plane->saturation = 0x1000;
335 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
336 plane->props.saturation, plane->saturation);
337
338 plane->iturbt_709 = 0;
339 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
340 plane->props.iturbt_709, plane->iturbt_709);
341
342 plane->set_params = nv10_set_params;
343 nv10_set_params(plane);
344 nv10_disable_plane(&plane->base);
345 return;
346cleanup:
347 drm_plane_cleanup(&plane->base);
348err:
349 kfree(plane);
350 NV_ERROR(drm, "Failed to create plane\n");
351}
352
353static int
354nv04_update_plane(struct drm_plane *plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc,
355 struct drm_framebuffer *fb, int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
356 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
357 uint32_t src_x, uint32_t src_y,
358 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h)
359{
360 struct nvif_object *dev = &nouveau_drm(plane->dev)->device.object;
361 struct nouveau_plane *nv_plane =
362 container_of(plane, struct nouveau_plane, base);
363 struct nouveau_framebuffer *nv_fb = nouveau_framebuffer(fb);
364 struct nouveau_bo *cur = nv_plane->cur;
365 uint32_t overlay = 1;
366 int brightness = (nv_plane->brightness - 512) * 62 / 512;
367 int pitch, ret, i;
368
369 /* Source parameters given in 16.16 fixed point, ignore fractional. */
370 src_x >>= 16;
371 src_y >>= 16;
372 src_w >>= 16;
373 src_h >>= 16;
374
375#ifdef __NetBSD__ /* XXX ALIGN means something else. */
376 pitch = round_up(src_w * 4, 0x100);
377#else
378 pitch = ALIGN(src_w * 4, 0x100);
379#endif
380
381 if (pitch > 0xffff)
382 return -ERANGE;
383
384 /* TODO: Compute an offset? Not sure how to do this for YUYV. */
385 if (src_x != 0 || src_y != 0)
386 return -ERANGE;
387
388 if (crtc_w < src_w || crtc_h < src_h)
389 return -ERANGE;
390
391 ret = nouveau_bo_pin(nv_fb->nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM, false);
392 if (ret)
393 return ret;
394
395 nv_plane->cur = nv_fb->nvbo;
396
397 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_OE_STATE, 0);
398 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_SU_STATE, 0);
399 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_RM_STATE, 0);
400
401 for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
402 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_BUFF0_START_ADDRESS + 4 * i,
403 nv_fb->nvbo->bo.offset);
404 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_BUFF0_PITCH_LENGTH + 4 * i, pitch);
405 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_BUFF0_OFFSET + 4 * i, 0);
406 }
407 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_WINDOW_START, crtc_y << 16 | crtc_x);
408 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_WINDOW_SIZE, crtc_h << 16 | crtc_w);
409 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_STEP_SIZE,
410 (uint32_t)(((src_h - 1) << 11) / (crtc_h - 1)) << 16 | (uint32_t)(((src_w - 1) << 11) / (crtc_w - 1)));
411
412 /* It should be possible to convert hue/contrast to this */
413 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_RED_CSC_OFFSET, 0x69 - brightness);
414 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_GREEN_CSC_OFFSET, 0x3e + brightness);
415 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_BLUE_CSC_OFFSET, 0x89 - brightness);
416 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_CSC_ADJUST, 0);
417
418 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_CONTROL_Y, 0x001); /* (BLUR_ON, LINE_HALF) */
419 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_CONTROL_X, 0x111); /* (WEIGHT_HEAVY, SHARPENING_ON, SMOOTHING_ON) */
420
421 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_FIFO_BURST_LENGTH, 0x03);
422 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_FIFO_THRES_SIZE, 0x38);
423
424 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_KEY, nv_plane->colorkey);
425
426 if (nv_plane->colorkey & (1 << 24))
427 overlay |= 0x10;
428 if (fb->pixel_format == DRM_FORMAT_YUYV)
429 overlay |= 0x100;
430
431 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_OVERLAY, overlay);
432
433 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_SU_STATE, nvif_rd32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_SU_STATE) ^ (1 << 16));
434
435 if (cur)
436 nouveau_bo_unpin(cur);
437
438 return 0;
439}
440
441static int
442nv04_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *plane)
443{
444 struct nvif_object *dev = &nouveau_drm(plane->dev)->device.object;
445 struct nouveau_plane *nv_plane =
446 container_of(plane, struct nouveau_plane, base);
447
448 nvif_mask(dev, NV_PVIDEO_OVERLAY, 1, 0);
449 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_OE_STATE, 0);
450 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_SU_STATE, 0);
451 nvif_wr32(dev, NV_PVIDEO_RM_STATE, 0);
452 if (nv_plane->cur) {
453 nouveau_bo_unpin(nv_plane->cur);
454 nv_plane->cur = NULL;
455 }
456
457 return 0;
458}
459
460static const struct drm_plane_funcs nv04_plane_funcs = {
461 .update_plane = nv04_update_plane,
462 .disable_plane = nv04_disable_plane,
463 .set_property = nv_set_property,
464 .destroy = nv_destroy_plane,
465};
466
467static void
468nv04_overlay_init(struct drm_device *device)
469{
470 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(device);
471 struct nouveau_plane *plane = kzalloc(sizeof(struct nouveau_plane), GFP_KERNEL);
472 int ret;
473
474 if (!plane)
475 return;
476
477 ret = drm_plane_init(device, &plane->base, 1 /* single crtc */,
478 &nv04_plane_funcs,
479 formats, 2, false);
480 if (ret)
481 goto err;
482
483 /* Set up the plane properties */
484 plane->props.colorkey = drm_property_create_range(
485 device, 0, "colorkey", 0, 0x01ffffff);
486 plane->props.brightness = drm_property_create_range(
487 device, 0, "brightness", 0, 1024);
488 if (!plane->props.colorkey ||
489 !plane->props.brightness)
490 goto cleanup;
491
492 plane->colorkey = 0;
493 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
494 plane->props.colorkey, plane->colorkey);
495
496 plane->brightness = 512;
497 drm_object_attach_property(&plane->base.base,
498 plane->props.brightness, plane->brightness);
499
500 nv04_disable_plane(&plane->base);
501 return;
502cleanup:
503 drm_plane_cleanup(&plane->base);
504err:
505 kfree(plane);
506 NV_ERROR(drm, "Failed to create plane\n");
507}
508
509void
510nouveau_overlay_init(struct drm_device *device)
511{
512 struct nvif_device *dev = &nouveau_drm(device)->device;
513 if (dev->info.chipset < 0x10)
514 nv04_overlay_init(device);
515 else if (dev->info.chipset <= 0x40)
516 nv10_overlay_init(device);
517}
